column4: Hi, I'm running VirtualBox w/ XP and every time before I can boot XP I have to change permissions to /dev/vboxdrv by running sudo nautilus in terminal then locating the file and change the permissions every time after reboot? is there an easier way to permanently change permission to files?
did you add yourself to the virtualbox/vbox/whatever group?
go to users/groups under System > Admin
then Manage Groups. make sure you're in vboxusers group.
